OnlyLive.label: Only when live
OnlyLive.tooltip: Command is only active when stream is live

Command.label: Command Name
Command.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

Usage.label: Usage
Usage.tooltip: Usage for where the script can be used!

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

PermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for permission

Mode.label: Mode
Mode.tooltip:
Set the mode of the game 
 
3 Wires = less risk less reward (same as the deepbot version by Alixe.)
4 Wires = 4 different wires instead of 3, making the risk and reward higher!
5 Wires = 5 wires, risk and reward is even higher

UseRandom.label: Use random payouts
UseRandom.tooltip: If checked the payouts will be randomized between a min and max value that are both bigger than the cost

Gif.label: Defuse GIF link
Gif.tooltip: Link to the gif to play when the bomb is successfully defused

Duration.label: GIF duration (seconds)
Duration.tooltip: Duration in seconds that the gif will be shown.

SF.label: Soundfile
SF.tooltip:
Soundfile to play if play sound is enabled.
This file must be located in the scripts sound folder, button below to open it.

BWSB.label: Play detonation gif
BWSB.tooltip: Play gif when bomb is detonated

GifB.label: Detonation GIF link
GifB.tooltip: Link to the gif to play when the bomb is detonated

DurationB.label: GIF duration (seconds)
DurationB.tooltip: Duration in seconds that the gif will be shown.

SFB.label: Soundfile
SFB.tooltip:
Soundfile to play if play sound is enabled.
This file must be located in the scripts sound folder, button below to open it.

Timeout.label: Timeout
Timeout.tooltip: Timeout users who fail to defuse the bomb. Only works for Twitch

OnCooldown.value: $user the command is still on cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
OnCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

OnUserCooldown.value: $user the command is still on user cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
OnUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

BaseResponse.value: The bomb is beeping and $user cuts the $target wire...
BaseResponse.label: Base response
BaseResponse.tooltip:
First part of the response that is followed by either win or lose response directly after
 {0} = user 
 {1} = wire the user cuts

NotEnoughResponse.value: $user you don't have enough points to get the tools needed to defuse the bomb!
NotEnoughResponse.label: Not enough currency response
NotEnoughResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't have enough points 
 {0} = user

WinResponse.value: the bomb goes silent. As a thanks for saving the day you got awarded {1} $currencyname and now has {2} $currencyname
WinResponse.label: Win response
WinResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user wins 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = value won 
 {2} = points after win 
 {3} = Currency name

LoseResponse.value: BOOM!!! The bomb explodes, you lost {1} $currencyname and now have {2} $currencyname{2} {3}
LoseResponse.label: Lose response
LoseResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user fails to defuse the bomb 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = lost won 
 {2} = points after loss 
 {3} = Currency name

InfoResponse.value: $user you have to chose one of the following wires to cut: {1}
InfoResponse.label: Info response
InfoResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't have the required permission. 
{0} = user 
{1} = valid wires

PermissionResp.value: $user -> only $permission ($permissioninfo) and higher can use this command
PermissionResp.label: Permission denied response
PermissionResp.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't select any valid wire. 
{0} = user 
{1} = permission
{2} = permission info

BtnDefaults.label: Restore Default Settings
BtnDefaults.tooltip:
Reset settings back to defaults.
Reload Scripts afterwards to see the changes in the user interface!

CalculateChances.label: Calculate Chances
CalculateChances.tooltip: Tests the outcome of 1million cuts in your current gamemode!

openReadMe.label: Open README.txt
openReadMe.tooltip: Opens the README.txt for this script
